document_data.name: ''Daggerford Blade''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Daggerford Blade''''' was an enchanted [[halberd]] wielded by [[Nayeli Goldflower]], a former member of the [[Guardians of Daggerford]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: This regal-looking magic weapon had a gilded head, decorated with inlaid purple [[gem]]stones.
document_data.Powers: The ''Daggerford Blade's'' enchantments enveloped the wielder and reflected portion of damage dealt to them back at the opponent.
document_data.Notable Owners: *Nayeli Goldflower: a [[paladin]] from the city of [[Daggerford]] and an adventurer who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
